title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.25 - No smoking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.25 - No smoking

State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any person to smoke or to light any
match or to use or carry any open flame, or for any person, firm, or
corporation to permit any smoking or the lighting of any match or the use or
carrying of any open flame upon any wharf or in any transit shed, warehouse or
any similar building on Port property under the control of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

800.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
